attributes.additional_details: The school is run by REAch2 Academy Trust, there is a loss in confidence that Reach2 will fulfill their commitments to the children of Chigwell.
attributes.background: Our children in the Chigwell community deserve a school environment that is appropriate for their growth, development and experience. At present Chigwell Primary Academy school is failing its pupils. Having a poor rundown environment does not help to enchance a childs school life it hinders it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

The UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for building works at individual schools.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
